response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which is valued at $8,000 to us. This product is designed to provide exceptional benefits tailored to your needs. Considering its high quality and unique features, I am extending an exclusive offer to you at a price of $7,500. I believe this is a great opportunity for both of us, as it allows you to benefit from our product at a competitive price while ensuring we receive a fair compensation for our efforts and resources invested. Please let me know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer.", "product_price": 7500}
